successes.title: Holy Ghost Experience
successes.description: A film that will capture the power, mystery, and character of the Holy Spirit through amazing God encounters around the world.

Pledges.description: BACKSTAGE PASS >> You'll receive exclusive backstage access to the entire film experience including a sneak peek at the film before it's finished, the option to submit questions for the people we interview, and a chance to play a part in decisions along the way.
LEND A HAND (NEW) >> You will sponsor one (1) person to attend next summer's Holy Ghost Tour, in addition to receiving the BACKSTAGE PASS.
LEND A FEW HANDS (NEW) >> You will sponsor five (5) people to attend next summer's Holy Ghost Experience, in addition to the BACKSTAGE PASS.
I'M A FAN >> You'll receive a Limited Kickstarter Only REGULAR EDITION of the Holy Ghost DVD months before the official release, in addition to exclusive backstage access.
LEND A BUNCH OF HANDS (NEW) >> You will sponsor ten (10) people to attend next summer's Holy Ghost Experience, in addition to receiving the BACKSTAGE PASS.
I'M A BIG FAN >> You'll receive a Limited Kickstarter Only DELUXE EDITION of the Holy Ghost DVD months before the official release, in addition to exclusive backstage access.

I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN >> You'll receive a Limited Kickstarter Only COLLECTOR'S EDITION of the Holy Ghost DVD with "Making The Experience" photo book detailing the entire production, months before the official release, in addition to exclusive backstage access.

THE GUEST DIRECTOR >> You'll receive one entry to film the Holy Ghost at work and submit up to 1 hour of unedited footage to Wanderlust for possible inclusion in the final film! You'll also get everything included in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier.

HOUSE PARTY (NEW) >> Invite your friends to your home for a premiere of the film. You'll receive "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" for yourself, DVDs for all your guests, specially designed invitations, and a personal video introduction from Darren.

CHILLIN' WITH THE HOMIES >> You'll receive an invitation to an intimate day with Wanderlust, private premiere of the film in Chicago, and dinner with the team. You'll also get everything included in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier.

WELCOME TO THE FAMILY >> You'll receive our entire catalogue of products, primary placement in the credits, special placement on our website, and a 60 second video thank you from Darren.  You'll also get everything in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier.

THE CREW (U.S. ONLY) >> You'll get to join us on a U.S. film shoot to be a part of our crew, post updates to the other backers, and document your experience along the way. You'll also get everything included in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier.
(no film experience required; airfare not included; shooting Sept 10-12, 2013)
CASTING CALL (U.S. ONLY) >> You'll get to join us on a U.S. film shoot and actually be in the film! You'll also get everything included in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier.

CLEAN YOUR HOUSE >> Director Darren Wilson will personally come to your church, small group, or home to spend the day with you and give an intimate premiere of the film before it is released. You'll also get everything included in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier.

THE TOUR STOP (NEW) >> Fund a complete Tour Stop and receive two VIP tickets, plus flight & lodging, to the big premiere at Bethel Church, in Redding, California! You'll also receive everything included in the "I'M, LIKE, A HUGE FAN" tier. (U.S. Travel Only)
THE ULTIMATE (INTL TRIP) >> You'll get to join us on an International Film Shoot to be a part of the crew, post updates to the other backers, and document your experience along the way.
